views.markdown:
- Support iOS 13 - Optimize for iOS 9. - Support WebKit based view(e.g. Safari). - Support for iOS 8
- Fix crash on markedTextRange unsupported text component.
- Remove MoveCaretWithHorizontalScroll option, it became the default.
- Refine icons.
- Support IME candidate string update.
- Fixed text deletion issue during Korean syllable composing on iOS 7. thx @devbug0 - Add "PreventSwipeLoupe" option.

- Support arm64 devices

- Support iOS 7. - Add MoveWithHorizonScrollMode. - Fix for un-editable webView. - All feature available on all iOS version.
- Fix edge position handling
- Fix crash on some apps.
- Add V.Scroll Lock and Move option
- Remove CaretMagnifier option
* don't prevent other gesture.
* V.Scroll Lock option
- Add CaretMagnifier option.
- Modify preference - Fix reveal issue of vertical scroll (thanks Henry Wang)

- iOS 4 compatible
- Adjust faster by swipe speed
- Add support 123, ABC, ☆123 and あいう key for selection feature
- Re-fix SMS part issue

- Add Faster by swipe speed option
- Re-fix SMS part and reveal issue

- Add auto popup menu feature.
- Fix reveal issue.
- Don't affect if start from vertical scroll.
- Improve stability.

- Add PreferenceLoader dependency

- Add Continual Move feature.
- Add preference.
- Fix SMS part issue.
- Remove Activator action with dependency
HotFix: crash issue

Fix: SMS sending crash
Fix: Rotate behavior issue
New: Add support Activator for gesture unavailable view( e.g. SMS )
fix crash issue

Various fix for right to left writing direction langs

Fix keyboard observer handling
